author: Kanishk Thakur
title: Chael Sonnen Makes Bold Prediction on ‘Final Appearance’ of Jon Jones Against Tom Aspinall
description: Jon Jones had told everyone that he would probably retire after defeating Stipe Miocic at UFC 309. But that didn’t happen. Instead, ‘Bones’ floated an Alex Pereira fight, and even acquiesced to considering a Tom Aspinall fight for ‘f**k you money’. But the Aspinall fight may really be the last hurrah for Jones, at least […]The post Chael Sonnen Makes Bold Prediction on ‘Final Appearance’ of Jon Jones Against Tom Aspinall appeared first on EssentiallySports.
